SELECT p.gds_no, p.gds_nm, p.last_sel_prc, img.img_file_path_nm FROM products p LEFT JOIN product_images img ON p.gds_no = img.gds_no AND img.rprs_img_yn = 'Y' WHERE p.gds_nm LIKE #{pattern}
AND p.expsr_yn = 1 ORDER BY p.reg_dt DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM products p WHERE p.gds_nm LIKE #{pattern}
AND p.expsr_yn = 1

SELECT p.pst_sn, p.pst_ttl, LEFT(p.pst_cn, 100) AS pst_cn, p.crt_dt, u.user_ncnm FROM posts p JOIN users u ON p.wrtr_user_no = u.user_no WHERE p.pst_ttl LIKE #{pattern} AND u.user_status = '활동' ORDER BY p.crt_dt DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM posts p JOIN users u ON p.wrtr_user_no = u.user_no WHERE p.pst_ttl LIKE #{pattern} AND u.user_status = '활동'

SELECT u.user_ncnm, u.user_lgn_id, pro.prfl_img, u.user_no FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_profiles pro ON u.user_no = pro.user_no WHERE (u.user_nm LIKE #{pattern} OR u.user_ncnm LIKE #{pattern}) AND u.user_status = '활동' ORDER BY u.join_dt DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users u WHERE (u.user_nm LIKE #{pattern} OR u.user_ncnm LIKE #{pattern}) AND u.user_status = '활동'
SELECT CONCAT('SRCH_LOG_', LPAD(COALESCE(MAX(CAST(REPLACE(srch_log_id, 'SRCH_LOG_', '') AS UNSIGNED)), 0) + 1, 5, '0')) FROM search_logs
